name: Contoso.StoreCommercePackagingSample
description: An extension package containing POS samples to showcase how to create a Store Commerce Extension Package and Installer.

triggers.name: Application Start Load knockout.js Trigger
triggers.description: An extension to execute custom logic to load the knockout.js library when the application is launched.

triggers.name: PreProductSaleTrigger
triggers.description: An extension to execute custom logic prior to executing the Product Sale Operation.

triggers.name: PostCartCheckoutPrintFileTrigger
triggers.description: An extension to execute custom logic after the cart checkout is completed.

triggers.name: PostLogonTrigger
triggers.description: An extension to execute custom logic after the Store Commerce Logon.

triggers.name: PreUnlockTerminalTrigger
triggers.description: A sample trigger showing how to add extra parameter in the logon request in unlock terminal scenario. PIN number will be added in this sample.

triggers.name: PreElevateUserTrigger
triggers.description: A sample trigger showing how to add extra parameter in the logon request in manager override scenario. PIN number will be added in this sample.

triggers.name: PreLogOnTrigger
triggers.description: A sample trigger showing how to add extra parameter in the logon request in POS logon scenario. PIN number will be added in this sample.

triggers.name: PreEnrollUserCredentialsTrigger
triggers.description: A sample trigger showing how to add extra parameter on enrolling user credential scenario. PIN number will be added in this sample.

productListConfiguration.name: Customized Product Search Columns
productListConfiguration.description: An extension providing a customized set of columns on the product search grid.
